column6: KITCHEN IRISH" continues!  Chaos ensues when Frank Castle finally tracks down Finn Cooley. Copies of this book scatter faster than a shotgun blast - it seems everyone wants the MAX Punisher series!  Get in front of a copy today, but make sure the safety is on.
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | writer:Garth Ennis | penciller:Leandro Fernandez | colorist:Dean White
